info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Warren, northeastern Fulton, northern Saratoga and central Washington Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake George Village, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glens Falls around 315 PM EDT. Whitehall and Comstock around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Thurman Station, Cleverdale, Beartown, Tenantville, Dunham Basin, Smiths Basin, Sweets Crossing, Lake Luzerne, Adamsville and North Granville. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
